author: thomasm
msg: OAK-28 Query implementation: new feature "measure" to get the number of scanned nodes per selector instead of the nodes themselves or the query plan; (join) conditions are pushed down to the selectors if possible, this can reduce the number of nodes read; renamed method "apply" to "restrict"; the XPath to SQL-2 converter now supports joins and only uses parentheses where needed; test queries are now much faster because /jcr:system child nodes are excluded and join conditions are pushed down; if queries take more than 3 seconds now the test is considered as failed

author: jwross
msg: Change build order of subsystem to just after application but before ejb, jmx, and jpa.

author: billie
msg: ACCUMULO-700 ACCUMULO-507 changed InputFormat internal configuration serialization for iterators (now uses IteratorSetting) and ranges (now written to a file)
